com.viaoa.jfc.control

Class ListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      • com.viaoa.jfc.control.OAJfcController
        • com.viaoa.jfc.control.ListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.viaoa.hub.HubListener, EventListener, ListSelectionListener

    public class ListController
extends OAJfcController
implements ListSelectionListener
    Controller for binding OA to JList.
    Author:
    vvia

        public void valueChanged(ListSelectionEvent e)
